org.assertj.core.groups

Class FieldsOrPropertiesExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.groups.FieldsOrPropertiesExtractor

  • public class FieldsOrPropertiesExtractor
extends Object
    Understands how to retrieve fields or properties values from a collection/array of objects.

    You just have to give the field/property name, a collection/array of objects and it will extract the list of field/property values from the given objects.

    Author:
    Joel Costigliola
